item.title: Set up your hooks project
item.description: Set up your hooks project Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: A new doc that describes how to set up a project that is the same for both inline and event hooks. The current doc mixes both and describes difference steps for each hook type. This doc only describes the steps that are the same and leaves the unique bits for further down in the specific area.

item.title: Best practices
item.description: Best practices for hook implementations Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/hooks-best-practices/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Best practice A Best Practices document presents a set of best practices to the reader.
